code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import Header from'./Header';import Hero from'./Hero';import About from'./About';import Skills from'./Skills';import Experience from'./Experience';import Projects from'./Projects';import Achievements from'./Achievements';import Contact from'./Contact';import Footer from'./Footer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Portfolio=()=>{const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState('home');useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const sections=['home','about','skills','experience','projects','achievements','contact'];const scrollPosition=window.scrollY+100;sections.forEach(section=>{const element=document.getElementById(section);if(element){const{offsetTop,offsetHeight}=element;if(scrollPosition>=offsetTop&&scrollPosition<offsetTop+offsetHeight){setActiveSection(section);}}});};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"portfolio",initial:{opacity:0},animate:{opacity:1},transition:{duration:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{activeSection:activeSection}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"portfolio-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hero,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Skills,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"experience",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Experience,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"achievements",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Achievements,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contact",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Portfolio;
